description.p: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

This +1 longbow is a one ofa kind creation. Made from the anger of Saelcerys this bow can change its form into twin short swords as a bonus action. Attacks made with this weapon do WISDOM MODIFIER bonus lightning damage. In shon sword form wielder gains +1 AC. When you roll a 1 in bow form you cast the thunderclap cantrip. When not being used Stormbreaker can float around you in shards with your swarm or be turned into a dense shield on our back. Dama Id10+dex+wis+1
Stormbreaker has 3 charges per long rest it can use to cast spells.

1 Charge: Storm of arrows, I Action, Range 60ft, 40ft cylinder IOft wide- Fire an arrow of pure electricity into the air, after reaching above its mark the arrow magically duplicates creating a rain of lightning bolts. Creature inside the circle make a dexterity saving throw or take 4d6 lightning damage

1 Charge: Magnetic arrows, Range 90ft, Duration 1 hour (increased by 1 hour per charge used) - As a bonus action mark an enemy with a lightning charge, all of your attacks against the enemy have +3 and deal an extra ld8 lightning damage. If the target dies before the spell ends as a bonus action you can move the lightning charge to another creature in range. Marked targets do not gain any bonuses from cover.

1 Charge: Thunderwave: Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from you must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 3d8 thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.
